aboutContent.title: ABOUT ME
aboutContent.description: I am a passionate frontend developer with a deep commitment to creating dynamic, user-friendly applications using the latest web technologies. My goal is to transform ideas into seamless digital experiences that resonate with users.
aboutContent.category1Text: My expertise lies in building responsive, efficient, and visually appealing interfaces. I leverage modern frameworks and tools to ensure that every project is optimized for performance and accessibility across all devices.
aboutContent.category2Text: I believe that great design starts with understanding the user's needs. I prioritize user experience in every step of the development process, ensuring that the end product is not only functional but also intuitive and enjoyable to use.

skillsText.headline: SKILLS
skillsText.description: I have a solid foundation in modern web development, with experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular. I enjoy building dynamic, user-focused applications using HTML5, CSS/SCSS, and tools like Firebase for backend integration. I also have experience working with APIs to create seamless connections between front-end interfaces and backend services.
skillsText.sublineText: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding my knowledge and would be especially interested in advancing my skills with Vue JS and React.

portfolioContent.headline: PORTFOLIO
portfolioContent.description: Welcome to my portfolio! Here, you'll find a collection of projects that showcase my journey as a frontend developer. Each project reflects the skills I've acquired and my commitment to creating engaging, user-friendly web applications.

pokedex.title: POKEDEX
pokedex.subtitle: JAVASCRIPT | HTML | CSS | API
pokedex.description: An interactive project displaying Pok√©mon data using an API.

join.description: A task management tool that facilitates team collaboration.

el_pollo_loco.title: EL POLLO LOCO
el_pollo_loco.subtitle: JAVASCRIPT | HTML | CSS | OBJECT ORIENTATION
el_pollo_loco.description: A game project that illustrates basic concepts of object-oriented programming.

portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.subtitle: ANGULAR | TYPESCRIPT | HTML | CSS | HOSTING
portfolio.description: This website serves as a portfolio and showcases my skills in Angular and web development.
